title: Effective Peer Feedback Strategies in Online Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Peer feedback training program for language education teachers' competency enhancement

learning_goals: Learners can write at least two specific and actionable feedbacks on peers' lesson designs.
Learners can propose at least three alternative instructional strategies with an open attitude during peer feedback.
Learners can revise their lesson designs based on received feedback and document at least one reflective practice record.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
